mapper.select: select * from member where name = #{name} and email = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into member_deleted (m_idx, id, pw, nickname, name, age, gender, tel, email, address, joinDate, point) values (#{m_idx}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{address}, #{joinDate}, #{point});
